English: Above the sea, south-west of Morton
We're almost there, comrades! Listen up!
Our goal is the coastal village of Morton. We attack from the west. We're team Anton, team Boris supports us from the east.
There are no armoured vehicles reported in the village and they do not expect us, but be careful nonetheless.
Remember your training! Take cover whenever possible. Use the buildings, stay off open ground. Fire when you have a clear shot.
Follow my lead and good luck!
WITH ME, COMRADES. KEEP FORMATION. WE CONTINUE TO THE VILLAGE.
BAZA TO ANTON. MISSION COMPLETED. FORTIFY YOUR POSITIONS WITH BORIS AND AWAIT FURTHER ORDERS. BAZA OUT.
ANTON TO BORIS, WE'RE IN POSITION AND ADVANCING TO MORTON. OVER.
BORIS TO ANTON, WE'RE COMING ALONG THE EASTERN ROAD. WE'LL SEE YOU IN THE VILLAGE. OUT.
